title: Open Library
description: A web app, basically an open library that has a lot of books and texts available to users. The books are not necessarily owned by the library, a registered user can share their own book with the library where the book/text is unavailable in the library. To attract users, a feature where users can get rewarded with fungible tokens or any worthy collection where a book is read within a particular time or an esteemed user whose texts/books gets a stars for being the most read. Books in this context can be any kind of book, text or collection
